mapper.select: select m.*, a.sender_name, a.sender_img from tbl_message m inner join ( select user_no sender_no, user_name sender_name, user_img sender_img from tbl_user union select dlvr_no, dlvr_name, dlvr_img from tbl_deliver) a on m.sender_no = a.sender_no where m.order_no = #{order_no} order by m.msg_no

select m.*, a.sender_name, a.sender_img from tbl_message m inner join ( select user_no sender_no, user_name sender_name, user_img sender_img from tbl_user union select dlvr_no, dlvr_name, dlvr_img from tbl_deliver) a on m.sender_no = a.sender_no where m.order_no = #{order_no} and m.msg_no > #{msg_no} order by m.msg_no
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_message(msg_no, order_no, sender_no, receiver_no, msg_content) values(seq_message_no.nextval, #{order_no}, #{sender_no}, #{receiver_no}, #{msg_content})
insert into tbl_message(msg_no, order_no, sender_no, receiver_no, msg_img) values(seq_message_no.nextval, #{order_no}, #{sender_no}, #{receiver_no}, #{msg_img})
